Package model.Moore

Class Machine

java.lang.Object
model.Moore.Machine
public class Machine extends Object
Moore's state machine and its minimization.
Version:
0.1
Author:
Gilmar Andres Amezquita Romero

    • Machine

      public Machine(List<String> states, List<String> aStates, List<String> alphabet, String[][] t)
      Machine object constructor, of type Moore.
      Parameters:
      states - machine state list.
      aStates - machine acceptance state list.
      alphabet - machine alphabet list.
      t - machine transition matrix.

    • addStates

      public boolean addStates(List<String> states, List<String> aStates)
      Method to add the different states to a HashMap of machine states.
      Parameters:
      states - list of names of the states.
      aStates - list of names of the acceptance states.
      Returns:
      returns true if repeated states were entered, otherwise return false.

      Returns:

    • addTransitions

      public void addTransitions(String[][] t)
      Method to add all the transitions entered by the user.
      Parameters:
      t - matrix with rows as states, columns as symbols, and transitions in the coordinates.

    • removeInaccessible

      private List<String> removeInaccessible(List<String> accessibleStates, int iteration)
      Method to identify the states that are accessible in the machine.
      Parameters:
      accessibleStates - list of accessible states identified up to that iteration.
      iteration - current iteration of the method
      Returns:
      the list of accessible states

    • mooreReduced

      private List<List<String>> mooreReduced(List<List<String>> partitions)
      Method to start reducing the machine from P2
      Parameters:
      partitions - partitions list
      Returns:
      returns the list of states to reduce the machine

    • mooreReduced

      private List<List<String>> mooreReduced(List<List<String>> partitions, List<List<String>> newPartitions)
      Method to check if partition k is equal to partition k-1
      Parameters:
      partitions - partition k-1
      newPartitions - partition k
      Returns:
      return the new partition.

    • reducedPartition

      private List<List<String>> reducedPartition(List<String> p, List<List<String>> prevPartitions)
      Get a block from the partition and check if the block states stay in the same block or should be split and create new blocks.
      Parameters:
      p - block of the previous partition
      prevPartitions - previous partition.
      Returns:
      the new blocks for the next partition.

    • samePreviousPartition

      private boolean samePreviousPartition(State s0, State si, List<List<String>> prevPartitions)
      Method to check if two states are in the same block in the previous partition.
      Parameters:
      s0 - first state.
      si - second state.
      prevPartitions - previous partition.
      Returns:
      true if they are on the same partition, otherwise false.

    • defineNewStates

      private void defineNewStates(List<List<String>> reducedBlocks)
      Method to obtain the new states of the reduced machine.
      Parameters:
      reducedBlocks - blocks of the final partition.

    • defineAcceptanceStates

      private int defineAcceptanceStates(List<String> newStates)
      Method to define if a state is an acceptance states.
      Parameters:
      newStates - list of reduced machine states
      Returns:
      1 if it is an acceptance state, else 0

    • defineNewTransitions

      private void defineNewTransitions(List<List<String>> reducedBlocks)
      Method to define the transitions of the reduced machine.
      Parameters:
      reducedBlocks - final minimization blocks

    • defineNewTransitions

      private State defineNewTransitions(String state, String symbol)
      Method to define to which new state a symbol transitions.
      Parameters:
      state - start state.
      symbol - symbol to transition.
      Returns:
      state after transition.
